Package org.hallebarde.recrutement.api.gameplay.world

Interface Room

public interface Room
A room players can explore.

  • Method Details

    • id

      String id()
      Returns:
      the unique ID for this room in this world

    • name

      String name()
      Returns:
      this room's name

    • description

      Returns:
      this room's description

    • world

      World world()
      Returns:
      the world this room belongs to

    • getReachableRooms

      Map<String,Room> getReachableRooms()
      Returns:
      the rooms accessible from this one as an unmodifiable map

    • getUsersIn

      List<User> getUsersIn()
      Returns:
      the users present in this room, as a non thread safe list

    • getItemsIn

      List<Item> getItemsIn()
      Returns:
      the items present in this room, as a non thread safe list

    • getInteractions

      List<RoomInteraction> getInteractions()
      Returns:
      the list of interactions in this room, as an unmodifiable list

      Changes this rooms name's.

      void setDescription(String description)
      Changes this room's description.
      Parameters:

    • connectOneWay

      void connectOneWay(Room other)
      Makes the other room accessible from this one without making this one accessible to the other.
      Parameters:
      other - the room to make accessible

      Connects this two rooms together.
